articles.description: England hold on against Scotland at Stadium of Light to win their first Women's Nations League match.
articles.title: England hold off Scotland in Women's Nations League

articles.description: Iceland captain Glodis Viggosdottir heads in the only goal of the game as Wales lose in Reykjavik.
articles.title: Wales narrowly lose Nations League opener in Iceland

articles.description: Emiliano Boffelli scores 16 points as Argentina keep their quarter-final hopes alive with victory over Samoa in Saint-Etienne in Pool D.
articles.title: Argentina bounce back with Samoa win in Pool D

articles.description: The United States win all four matches on the opening morning of the Solheim Cup to lead Europe 4-0 at Finca Cortesin, Spain.
articles.title: US sweep Europe in opening Solheim Cup session

articles.description: Wigan Warriors seal the 2023 League Leaders' Shield as they edge out rivals Leigh Leopards on a tense night at Leigh Sports Village.
articles.title: Wigan defeat Leigh to win League Leaders' Shield

articles.description: Denmark's Emily Pedersen hits the second ever hole-in-one in Solheim Cup history on the par three 12th hole at Finca Cortesin in Spain.
articles.title: Europe's Pedersen hits Solheim Cup hole-in-one

articles.description: Sweden and Spain players stand together in solidarity before their Uefa Women's Nations League match following the scandal which has engulfed Spanish football.
articles.title: Sweden's players stand in solidarity with Spain

articles.description: Ireland face the biggest test of the Andy Farrell era as Saturday's much-anticipated World Cup match against holders South Africa finally arrives.
articles.title: 'Ireland face biggest test as Springboks showdown finally arrives'

articles.description: Alpine's Pierre Gasly brought Friday practice to an early end at the Japanese Grand Prix with a crash as Max Verstappen dominated the day.
articles.title: Verstappen dominates Friday practice in Japan

articles.description: Watch some of the best shots as Europe fight back in Friday's afternoon session to trail 5-3 in the Solheim Cup after the United States won all four of the morning matches.
articles.title: Europe fight back on day one of Solheim Cup - best shots
